name: sigma
Description: Sensitivity level for speed of others

name: vGain
Description: Sensitivity towards own speed, as speed gain for full lane change desire

name: fSpeed
Description: Factor on legal speed limit

name: TC
Description: Task capability

name: x0
Description: Look-ahead distance for mandatory lane changes, leaders, etc.

name: t0
Description: Look-ahead time for mandatory lane changes

name: HEXP
Description: Slope of exponential decay of task demand for increasing time headway

name: SA_MIN
Description: Minimum situational awareness

name: SA_MAX
Description: Maximum situational awareness

name: TR_MAX
Description: Maximum reaction time

name: TS_CRIT
Description: Critical task saturation, above which SA deteriorates

name: TS_MAX
Description: Maximum task saturation

name: beta_T
Description: Factor on task over-saturation for headway

name: beta_v0
Description: Factor on task over-saturation for speed

name: alpha
Description: Fraction of primary task that can be reduced by anticipation reliance

name: beta
Description: Fraction of auxiliary task that can be reduced by anticipation reliance

name: tau
Description: Headway relaxation time

name: vCong
Description: Speed threshold below which traffic is considered congested

name: LCdur
Description: Regular lane change duration

name: dFree
Description: Desire threshold for free lane change (without any preparation)

name: dSync
Description: Desire threshold for synchronized lane change (adjusting speed)

name: dCoop
Description: Desire threshold for cooperative lane change (indicator|others make gap)

name: a
Description: Maximum acceleration

name: b
Description: Maximum desired deceleration

name: b0
Description: Adjustment deceleration, e.g. when speed limit drops

name: delta
Description: Acceleration flattening exponent towards desired speed

name: s0
Description: Stopping distance

name: Tmin
Description: Minimum headway for gap-acceptance at high LC desire

name: Tmax
Description: Normal car-following headway

name: nLeaders
Description: Number of leaders

name: minGap
Description: Minimum time gap between conflict enter/leave events of self and others

name: bCrit
Description: Critical deceleration

name: s0conf
Description: Stopping distance at conflicts

name: timeFactor
Description: Safety factor on estimated time of events

name: stopArea
Description: Area before stop line where one is considered arrived at the intersection

name: bYellow
Description: Maximum deceleration to stop for traffic lights
